articles.title: Govinda to be quizzed by Odisha economic offences wing in Rs 1000 crore online Ponzi scam: Reports - Times of India
articles.description: The Odisha economic offences wing will soon be questioning Govinda in connection with the Rs 1000 crore online Ponzi scam. The actor endorsed products of a company named Solar Techno Alliance, which was found guilty of running the pan-India scam, and also att…
